Name: American Beauty (by David Embury)
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
Instructions: Prepare garnish of mint leaf or red rose petal
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with CRUSHED ICE.
Garnish with mint leaf or rose petal floated on surface.
Review: Both fresh and refreshing. A subtle hint of peppermint gives zing to this cognac-based cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe in David A. Embury 's 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of American Beauty (by David Embury) contains 249 calories
